column5: Details and Resources

Trainer:Ensure player have access and complete task in a timely manner

column4: People Engagement Slides.pptx with BC TL
column5:
BC TL: Train player on Pitching flow using People Engagement slides 

Player: This methodology will be essential throughout your journey as a BC at StoreHub.

Player: Pitch to trainer using F&B slides by following the recording steps.

Trainer: Evaluate presentation and soft skills.

Player: 

1. Challenge yourself by practicing a SPIN based on the merchant profile assigned to you. Spend 30 minutes to prep and remaining 30 minutes performing SPIN based on the assigned scenario.

2. Record your assessment using Lark Video. Once complete, share recording to BC TL.
Player: Next, watch some SPIN video samples
column7:
1. F&B SPIN recording
2. Retail SPIN recording

column5: BC TL: Share feedback to player on improvement areas.
Player: [Graded] Record your assessment using Lark Video. Once complete, share recording to BC TL.

column4: Closing Task - Video, POS & BackOffice demo
column5: Player: Spend 30 minutes to review the Closing and Product sample video to prepare for Closing Assessment.
BC TL: Share feedback to player on improvement areas. Then, set expectations for Closing 1 assessment.
Player: Record your assessment using Lark Video. Once complete, share recording to BC TL.
Player: Add products on BackOffice and have it displayed on the POS following assigned scenario for Closing 2. Include Product Demo in your Closing 2
BC TL: Share feedback to player on improvement areas. Then, set expectations for Closing 2 assessment.
Player: Record your assessment and include Product demo using Lark Video. Once complete, share recording to BC TL.
Player: Understand the overall process of how Business Consultants conduct demo sessions.
column7: 1. Provide quick guide to add products in BackOffice and POS

column5: BC TL: Share feedback to player on improvement areas. Then, set expectations for Full Pitching Assessment
Player: Continue review and prepare for Full Pitching assessment on Day 5

Player: 
1. There will be scoring for Full pitching video (Retail). Refer to the scenarios list for assigned scenarios and complete the recording on time. If there are any delays, it will impact the TL schedule and training agenda!

2. Video should contain SPIN + Product Demo + Closing (Full pitching flow)

3. Once complete, share Lark video recording to TLs

Player: 
1. There will be scoring for Full pitching video (F&B). Refer to the scenarios list for assigned scenarios and complete the recording on time. If there are any delays, it will impact the TL schedule and training agenda!

2. Video should contain SPIN + Product Demo + Closing (Full pitching flow)

3. Once complete, share Lark video recording to TLs

Player: Setup BackOffice and POS device following mock test scenario
BC TL: Share feedback to player on improvement areas. Then, set expectations for Mock Test
